#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;

ll n,m,k;
ll pot[6];

ll elev(ll a,ll b){
  if(b == 0) return 1;
  ll aux = elev(a,b/2);
  if(b%2) return (((aux*aux)%MOD)*a)%MOD;
  else return (aux*aux)%MOD;
}

int main(){
  cin >> n >> k >> m;
  --n;
  pot[0] = 1;
  ll inv = elev(3,MOD-2);
  for(int i = 1; i < 6; ++i) pot[i] = (pot[i-1]*n)%MOD;
  switch(k){
    case 1:
      cout << m%MOD << '\n';
      break;
    case 2:
      cout << (m*(2*pot[1]+1))%MOD << '\n';
      break;
    case 3:
      cout << (m*(2*pot[2]+2*pot[1]+1))%MOD << '\n';
      break;
    case 4:
      cout << (m*(1+2*pot[1]+2*pot[2]+(2*(2*pot[3]+pot[1])*inv)%MOD))%MOD << '\n';
      break;
    case 5:
      ll sol = 1;
      sol += ((2*(pot[2]-pot[1])*(pot[2]-pot[1]))%MOD)*inv;
      sol %= MOD;
      sol += 4*(2*pot[3]-3*pot[2]+pot[1])*inv;
      sol %= MOD;
      sol += 20*(pot[2]-pot[1])*inv;
      sol %= MOD;
      sol += 8*pot[1];
      sol %= MOD;
      cout << (m*sol)%MOD << '\n';
      break;
  }
}
